name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Imlauer Stieglbrau

reviews.title: Quiet, clean & friendly hotel
reviews.text: Located in new part of town, about 15 minute walk to old town (turn left outside hotel and keep walking).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small but well maintained room and overall good value for money. We were there during the annual music festival and other hotel guests were generally european couples.
reviews.title: A three star delight in Salzburg

reviews.text: Happy with my choice and other reviews on Trip Advisor. I would recommend this hotel at the price.
reviews.title: Nice Place

reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights in the Stieglbrau (21st-22nd Apr) and it was one of those places where you look back and reflect with pleasure on your run of luck. It is 5 minutes with suitcases (3 months worth of clothes) from the main railway station, clean comfortable, spacious, well placed, the staff are great, breakfast was wonderful and the dining facilties are ticketyboo!!! It has it all and value for money to boot, another big tick for the travel agent.
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay - great value for money
Happy Irish Tourists
reviews.text: Small room for solo travellers but clean, bright, furnished in typical hotel chain style. Close to gardens and within 10 minutes walking distance to city center (even for someone as slow as me). Restaurant just okay,

We stayed here two nights as part of a tour group. It is a converted brewery, so the layout is a little strange. The hotel was clean, staff friendly and courteous. Rooms were a little small, but that is Europe. Breakfast was excellent, with hot and cold choices. It was a little walk to the old part of town, but not too bad. Shopping close. No hesitation on recommending.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel and Convenient

reviews.text: stayed here for 3 nights with a party of 52 people and i thought they did a fantastic job, rooms were clean, breakfast was excellent with a choice of hot and cold choice buffet, we dined two nights in the hotel and the food was excellent. Hotel close to the city centre walking distance 20 minutes
reviews.title: good value, nice setting

likes.liked: — close to the city centre and all means of transport
likes.disliked: — i got a small room compared with others

reviews.title: We loved Salzburg and the Hotel Stieglbrau
reviews.text: My husband and I spent 2 weeks travelling in Europe this October/November. We spent 3 days in Salzburg and loved this beautiful city. Compared to Munich - the people were so friendly. We got a great rate at the Best Western Stieglbrau by booking online. The young man who worked in the evenings was really nice. We were tired after the drive from Munich so it was nice to have someone so friendly greet us when we arrived.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is really in a great location - right next to the train station and the parking free. My husband and I walked to Old Town everyday (about a 20 minute walk). We only took a cab one time because we were too tired in the evening. It cost 10 Euros. The rooms were very clean and updated. The glass on the windows were soundproofed so you could not hear any traffic from the street. The restaurant in the hotel was really good and priced. Breakfast was included in the room price and was very good. They have wireless internet access as well via a computer in the lobby. I used my laptop and sat in the lobby (it didn't work in the room).
reviews.title: Plain Boring looking hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Great for the cost and Close to town by Public Transit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is excellent value. It's located beside the other hotels and is only a short walk into the old town. We were a bit concerned about the quality as it seemed so cheap, but the rooms were clean and comfortable, with tv and minibar and the staff were friendly and helpful. Some reviewers didn't like the breakfast, but the continental breakfast was very good, with everything you'd expect; juices, fruit, cereal, breads, cheeses, hams, yoghourt and some hot food. We'd highly recommend this hotel - and the money we saved paid for a couple of tours!
reviews.title: Excellent value

likes.disliked: — can't really complain at that price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic hotel. The room was large, clean and very comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful - booking The Sound of Music tour for us, providing us with a map and advice, and also storing our bags as we arrived earlier than check in. The breakfast was fantastic, served in the restaurant which was decorated nicely and had very helpful and attentive staff. There was free fast internet in the foyer. Great location - easy walk to the train station and old town. Would happily stay here again.
reviews.title: lovely hotel, excellent breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights as part of Air Transat package. Terrific hotel, good sized room based on European standards, air conditioned, only 15 minute walk from old City, 5 minute walk from Mirabell Gardens. Great breakfast and had dinner on the patio which was terrific as well. Staff are friendly and helpful, wireless in lobby. Had view of the Obersalzburg Mountain from our room on the 5th floor. Hotel is actually two - the Stieglbrau and the Imlauer - and share a reception desk. The Imlauer side of the hotel is recently renovated and very nice compared to the rooms in the Stieglbrau or unrenovated portion. We loved Salzburg, the city, and the surrounding mountain and lakes district - St. Wolfgang is fairy tale like. I would definitely stay here again. Eagles Nest was also an amazing side trip.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - A Gem!

likes.disliked: — Lack of wireless in hotel room available in lobby only

reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel for 4 nights over the UK August Bank Holiday weekend, along with 2 other couples. We found the hotel well run and convenient for all the attractions.
reviews.title: Good hotel for a break

likes.liked: — The hotel was well run and convenient

reviews.text: The rooms at the back of the hotel were nice and quiet, but those at the front more noisy, especially early in the morning, with the traffic
reviews.title: good hotel ... (( average))

reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights in April 2008 and for about 80-90 EUR per night.
reviews.title: Great for the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our family had booked 2 rooms, 1 for 2 persons and another for 3 persons(this room was separated by the hallway & bathroom to allow the 3rd person a little privacy). Our rooms were both quite spacious and clean. The bed and comforter were very comfortable.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel in good location

likes.liked: — very good value for money and friendly

reviews.text: Bathrooms were nothing fancy, but clean with good hot water supply, clean towels, simple toiletries and fabulous water pressure.
reviews.title: Highly recommend, and good breakfast

reviews.text: Location was quite convenient to some of the sights. A slight walk to Old town but very manageable. Their front desk assisted us with booking a sound of music tour. The front desk is odd that it manages two best western hotels. One side of the counter is the stiegbrau and the other is a newer best western.
reviews.title: great staff
Good value
reviews.text: One of our rooms faced the train tracks. You could hear it running regularly but we were not too bothered by it (we were on the top floor)

description: Located in the centre of the city; short walk to all the historic sights & the railway station.
